name: The Chloe Pink Doodle & Dream Coloring Book
description:
The perfect gift for your favorite girl signed with a big pink marker by Chloe Pink, herself! 

Come along with Chloe Pink and her best friend, Pete, the terrier mutt as they lead you through 48 fun-filled activity pages of self-discovery and creative expression. It's the place to dream, write and doodle about something super important. You! "Doodle & Dream" features a high gloss cover with Chloe Pink original cartoons for her coloring pleasure plus: 10 Fill-In-The-Blank self confidence exercises • 12 Doodle & Dream pages • CP's Connect-The-Dots •  The "Be Curious About Everything" Word Search Puzzle • 5 Places to create your own fabulous art • Inspiration and support from Chloe Pink along the way! Ages 4-10.

Please click on "Contact" to tell Chloe Pink who to sign book to!

name: The Tell Your Secrets & Stuff To Chloe Pink Diary
description:
Do you want your daughter or favorite girl to follow her dreams? Then, you'll want to give her this little pink book signed by Chloe Pink asap!

That's because Chloe Pink is actually right in this diary to help your special girl discover and write down the secrets & stuff that make her so special! How? By being the curious girl that she is, she asks a lot of questions! Things like " What are the top 10 reasons you love being a girl? Who are your friends? What stresses you out? What makes things all better? Who supports you? What are your favorite hobbies, sports and activities? And much, much more. 

Plus -- Chloe Pink has added a FREE bonus section with the secret to making dreams come true! Once she learns the secret, watch out world! For ages 5-12. 

Please click on "Contact" to tell Chloe Pink who to sign book to!

name: The Chloe Pink Doodle & Dream in the City Book
description:
Are you ready for an urban adventure? Grab your crayons and markers! It's time to doodle and dream in the city. But this isn't just any city. It's the City of Decatur where dreams come true. Let me, Chloe Pink and my best friend, Jack, the Scottish Terrier Mutt be your tour guides. From cafes and shops to nature and history, there's so much to explore. Let your feet do the walking and your imagination do the talking. You've got pictures to complete, stuff to name, words to find and more. So, let's get going! XO, Chloe Pink

Chloe Pink is proud to donate $1 from every sale of this book to "Indie-Catur" to help support City of Decatur Tourism and its incredible independent merchants.

name: Chloe Pink Doodle Book & Diary Set
description:
When it comes to cheering on your favorite girl, Chloe Pink wrote the book. Actually, two books! And when you buy both together, you save a little. But gain a lot!

"Doodle & Dream," as we call it around here at Chloe Pink HQ, is filled with doodle pages, coloring sheets, a connect-the-dots, word search puzzle and more fun pencil (or crayon or marker) to paper activities.

"Secrets & Stuff," as the name suggests is for your favorite girl to get her important ideas and feelings down. Always the curious girl, Chloe Pink has tons of questions for her -- Who are your friends? What stresses you out? What's on your "to don't" list? Plus, just like "Doodle," it has places to draw and color too.

Together, they're a dreamy gift set for any girl 4-10. Helping her build self-confidence through self expression. That's what it's all about.

Add some crayons, markers, pencils, candy, etc. to create unique birthday gifts. It's Chloe Pink approved. 

Please email Chloe Pink via the contact form with a name(s) if you want her to sign them to your favorite girl!
